00017 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, SR830, "Stanford Research SR830 lock-in amp.");
00018 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, AH2500A, "Andeen-Hagerling 2500A capacitance bridge");

00020 XSR830::XSR830(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00021                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00022                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00023                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00024                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00025     : XCharDeviceDriver<XLIA>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00026     , m_cCount(10)
00027 {
00028     const char *tc[] = {"1e-5sec", "3e-5s", "1e-4s", "3e-4s", "1e-3s", "3e-3s", "1e-2s",
00029                         "3e-2", "0.1s", "0.3s", "1s", "3s", "10s", "30s", "100s", "300s", "1000s",
00030                         "3000s", "10000s", "30000s", ""};
00031     for(int i = 0; strlen(tc[i]) > 0; i++)
00032     {
00033         timeConst()->add(tc[i]);
00034     }
00035     const char *sens[] = {"2nV/fA", "5nV/fA", "10nV/fA", "20nV/fA", "50nV/fA", "100nV/fA",
00036                           "200nV/fA", "500nV/fA", "1uV/pA", "2uV/pA", "5uV/pA", "10uV/pA", "20uV/pA",
00037                           "50uV/pA", "100uV/pA", "200uV/pA", "500uV/pA", "1mV/nA", "2mV/nA", "5mV/nA",
00038                           "10mV/nA", "20mV/nA", "50mV/nA", "100mV/nA", "200mV/nA", "500mV/nA", "1V/uA",
00039                           ""};
00040     for(int i = 0; strlen(sens[i]) > 0; i++)
00041     {
00042         sensitivity()->add(sens[i]);
00043     }
00044     //    UseSerialPollOnWrite = false;
00045     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20);
00046     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(20);
00047     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(10);
00048 }
00049 void
00050 XSR830::get(double *cos, double *sin)
00051 {
00052     double sens = 0;
00053     int idx;
00054     bool autoscale_x = *autoScaleX();
00055     bool autoscale_y = *autoScaleY();
00056     if(autoscale_x || autoscale_y)
00057     {
00058         interface()->query("SENS?");
00059         idx = interface()->toInt();
00060         sens =  1e-9 * pow(10.0, rint(idx / 3));
00061         switch(idx % 3)
00062         {
00063         case 0: sens *= 2; break;
00064         case 1: sens *= 5; break;
00065         case 2: sens *= 10; break;
00066         }
00067     }
00068     interface()->query("SNAP?1,2");
00069     if(interface()->scanf("%lf,%lf", cos, sin) != 2)
00070         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00071     if((autoscale_x && (sqrt(*cos * *cos) > sens * 0.8)) ||
00072        (autoscale_y && (sqrt(*sin * *sin) > sens * 0.8)))
00073         sensitivity()->value(idx + 1);
00074     if((autoscale_x && (sqrt(*cos * *cos) < sens * 0.2)) ||
00075        (autoscale_y && (sqrt(*sin * *sin) < sens * 0.2)))
00076     {
00077         m_cCount--;
00078         if(m_cCount == 0)
00079         {
00080             sensitivity()->value(idx - 1);
00081             m_cCount = 10;
00082         }
00083     }
00084     else
00085         m_cCount = 10;
00086 }
00087 void
00088 XSR830::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00089 {
00090     interface()->query("OFLT?");
00091     timeConst()->value(interface()->toInt());
00092     interface()->query("SENS?");
00093     sensitivity()->value(interface()->toInt());
00094     interface()->query("SLVL?");
00095     output()->value(interface()->toDouble());
00096     interface()->query("FREQ?");
00097     frequency()->value(interface()->toDouble());
00098       
00099     start();
00100 }
00101 void
00102 XSR830::afterStop()
00103 {
00104     try {
00105         interface()->send("LOCL 0");
00106     }
00107     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00108         e.print(getLabel());
00109     }
00110     close();
00111 }
00112 void
00113 XSR830::changeOutput(double x)
00114 {
00115     interface()->sendf("SLVL %f", x);
00116 }
00117 void
00118 XSR830::changeSensitivity(int x)
00119 {
00120     interface()->sendf("SENS %d", x);
00121 }
00122 void
00123 XSR830::changeTimeConst(int x)
00124 {
00125     interface()->sendf("OFLT %d", x);
00126 }
00127 void
00128 XSR830::changeFreq(double x)
00129 {
00130     interface()->sendf("FREQ %g", x);
00131 }

00133 XAH2500A::XAH2500A(const char *name, bool runtime, 
00134                    const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00135                    const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00136                    const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00137                    const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers)
00138     : XCharDeviceDriver<XLIA>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)
00139 {
00140     const char *tc[] = {"0.04s", "0.08s", "0.14s", "0.25s", "0.5s",
00141                         "1s", "2s", "4s", "8s", "15s", "30s", "60s",
00142                         "120s", "250s", "500s", "1000s", ""};
00143     for(int i = 0; strlen(tc[i]) > 0; i++)
00144     {
00145         timeConst()->add(tc[i]);
00146     }
00147     const char *sens[] = {""};
00148     for(int i = 0; strlen(sens[i]) > 0; i++)
00149     {
00150         sensitivity()->add(sens[i]);
00151     }
00152     interface()->setGPIBUseSerialPollOnWrite(false);
00153     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeWrite(20);
00154     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeRead(20);
00155     interface()->setGPIBWaitBeforeSPoll(20);
00156     interface()->setGPIBMAVbit(0x80);
00157     fetchFreq()->value(10);
00158 
00159     autoScaleX()->disable();
00160     autoScaleY()->disable();
00161     sensitivity()->disable();
00162     frequency()->disable();
00163 }
00164 void
00165 XAH2500A::get(double *cap, double *loss)
00166 {
00167     interface()->query("SI");
00168     if(interface()->scanf("C=%lf %*s L=%lf", cap, loss) != 2)
00169         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00170 }
00171 void
00172 XAH2500A::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00173 {
00174     interface()->query("SH AV");
00175     int d;
00176     if(interface()->scanf("%*s AVEREXP=%d", &d) != 1)
00177         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00178     timeConst()->value(d);
00179     interface()->query("SH V");
00180     double f;
00181     if(interface()->scanf("%*s HIGHEST=%lf", &f) != 1)
00182         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00183     output()->value(f);
00184 
00185     interface()->send("NREM");
00186 
00187     start();
00188 }
00189 void
00190 XAH2500A::afterStop()
00191 {
00192     try {
00193         interface()->send("LOC");
00194     }
00195     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError &e) {
00196         e.print(getLabel());
00197     }
00198     close();
00199 }
00200 void
00201 XAH2500A::changeOutput(double x)
00202 {
00203     interface()->sendf("V %f", x);
00204 }
00205 void
00206 XAH2500A::changeTimeConst(int x)
00207 {
00208     interface()->sendf("AV %d", x);
00209 }
00210 void
00211 XAH2500A::changeSensitivity(int )
00212 {
00213     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Operation not supported."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00214 }
00215 void
00216 XAH2500A::changeFreq(double ) {
00217     throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(KAME::i18n("Operation not supported."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
